remark.en: MST program. Only students of the MST can take the course. Friday 13:20~16:20,R302,ESS,NTHU

goal.ch: This course is offered for junior/senior undergraduate students and graduate students with physical science or engineering backgrounds who previously have no extensive exposure to biochemistry.
goal.en: This course is offered for junior/senior undergraduate students and graduate students with physical science or engineering backgrounds who previously have no extensive exposure to biochemistry.

outline.ch:
"This course consists of lecture series and hands-on experiments. The topics covered in this course include:
(1) Basic Organic Chemistry
(2) Biomolecules
(3) Modern Bioanalytical Techniques"
outline.en:
"This course consists of lecture series and hands-on experiments. The topics covered in this course include:
(1) Basic Organic Chemistry
(2) Biomolecules
(3) Modern Bioanalytical Techniques"

textbook.ch:
"1. General, Organic and Biochemistry, Katherine J. Denniston, Joseph J. Topping and Robert L. Caret, McGraw Hill, 2004.
2. Bioanalytical Chemistry, Susan R. Mikkelsen and Eduardo Corton, John Wiley & Sons, 2004."
textbook.en:
"1. General, Organic and Biochemistry, Katherine J. Denniston, Joseph J. Topping and Robert L. Caret, McGraw Hill, 2004.
2. Bioanalytical Chemistry, Susan R. Mikkelsen and Eduardo Corton, John Wiley & Sons, 2004."

en.competencies: Advanced knowledge in the research subfield

ch: 系所:限物理學系碩士班、物理學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc  in Physics、PhD in Physics only.
